content: depend on how high the instep is and how much more room is needed in that area of the instep work across instep then work a shadow wrap short row heel or any other short row heel over 28 30 32 34 36 38 st on heel side see side note for a tidiness tip using a contrasting yarn i knit magic loop and have all my heel stitches on one needle row 1 knit 27 29 31 33 35 37 work ksw turn row 2 purl 26 28 30 32 34 36 work psw turn row 3 knit to one stitch before shadow wrapped stitch work ksw turn row 4 purl to one stitch before shadow wrapped stitch work psw turn repeat last 2 row until you have 9 10 10 11 12 13 shadow wrapped stitches on each side and 10 10 12 12 12 12 center stitches if you need a wider heel work fewer short row if you need a narrower heel work more short row now for the second half row 1 knit across center heel stitches to first shadow wrapped stitch knit that twinned stitch as one stitch be careful you don t knit that as two stitches and end up making an increase work tksw and turn row 2 purl to first shadow wrapped stitch purl that twinned stitch as one stitch work tpsw and turn row 3 knit across to the triplet stitch knit it then work tksw in next shadow wrapped stitch and turn row 4 purl across to the triplet stitch purl it then work tpsw in next shadow wrapped stitch and turn repeat row 3 and 4 until there is one triplet stitch left on each side having just completed row 4 ©2022 holly isaac for personal use only hollyisaac on ravelry pattern support hollymocha3@gmail com 2 if using contrasting yarn cut it leaving a long tail for weaving in later and pick up your original yarn and knit across heel stitches including last triplet stitch on the left side note i usually knit the first couple of stitches tight and with both yarns held together to prevent holes continue on to instep working one complete round knitting that last triplet stitch on right side of heel as one stitch then start decreasing the gusset stitches out until back to the original stitch count as follows round 1 ssk knit gusset stitches which should be about 4 - 6 depending on how many were added sm work instep sm knit to 2 st from end on instep k2tog round 2 work without decreasing knitting all stitches continue this way until gusset stitches are gone and back to original stitch count foot knit until approximately 1 5 1 5 1 75 1 75 2 2 inches shorter than desired foot length toe round 1 knit round 2 decrease round k1 ssk knit to 3 stitches before end of instep k2tog k1 repeat across sole stitches then work round 1 three
